docs.lead_paragraph: THE BATTLE FOR THE WORLD'S DOMINION.-- A German archaeologist, Dr. ERLINGER, has, after two year's labor, succeeded in ascertaining the precise position of the camps of ANTONY and OCTAVIUS, just before the Battle of Actium, which place, now called Azio, is on the Gulf of Arla, in Epirns.

headline.main: ARRIVAL OF THE NORTHERN LIGHT.; INTERESTING FROM NEW-GRANADA. Progress of the War Between Costa Rica and Nicaragua. THE FINANCIAL CRISIS IN CALIFORNIA. Two Weeks Later from the South Pacific. RECEPTION OF THE U. S. MINISTER TO CHILI. Immense Mass Meeting in San Francisco on the Loss of the Central America. $1,750,000 in Treasure. TWO WEEKS LATER FROM CALIFORNIA. Complicity of the Mormons in the Late Emigrant Massacre. Further Outrages by the Mormons and their Indian Allies.

docs.lead_paragraph: The United States Mail steamship Northern Light, C. L. TINKLEPAUGH commanding, arrived at this port yesterday, from Aspinwall on the 21st Nov., with 603 passengers, the usual Pacific and California mails, and $118,652 78 in treasure, as follows: For New York $1,744,672 78; for New Orleans, $366,350, and for Havana, $7,650.
